mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOLIDAY_CALENDAR ( ID, CAL_DATE, IS_WORKDAY, HOLIDAY_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( HOLIDAY_CALENDAR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{calDate}, #{isWorkday}, #{holidayType}, #{description}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CAL_DATE AS calDate, IS_WORKDAY AS isWorkday, HOLIDAY_TYPE AS holidayType, DESCRIPTION FROM HOLIDAY_CALENDAR ORDER BY CAL_DATE
